description: ECC2 model (https://doi.org/10.1038/srep39647) with annotations from iJO1366 (https://doi.org/10.1038/msb.2011.65) and dG0 from eQuilibrator (https://doi.org/10.1093/nar/gkab1106) @ standard settings (pH 7.5 in cytosol, 7.0 elsewhere, and standard ionic strength of 250 mM and pMg of 2.5, and potential differences between compartments of -0.15 V).
